name: ReaFsub4
description: BOT Multi Force Subs File Sharing Bot is useful for storing files and can be accessed via a special link

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Input Bot token, Get from t.me/BotFather

OWNER.description: Enter the Telegram Username for the BOT Owner [ Don't use it @ ]

OWNER_ID.description: Enter the Telegram User ID for the BOT Owner

ADMINS.description: Enter User ID to get BOT Admin rights [Can only create links]

APP_ID.description: Get APP ID on the web my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get APP API HASH on the web my.telegram.org

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL1.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL2.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL3.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL4.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription

START_MESSAGE.description: The /start message initiates a prefix to the bot, Uses HTML parsemode format
START_MESSAGE.value: ðŸ¦‹ Hello {first} I can save private files in Specific Channels and other users can access them from special links.

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Force Subscribe bot message, Use HTML parsemode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: ðŸ¦‹ Hello {first} You must join my Channel/Group to use me Please Join The Channel First
